newsitem.title: CHINA: Foreign investment in China $469 bln at end-1996.
newsitem.headline: Foreign investment in China $469 bln at end-1996.

text.p: Foreign businessmen had pledged to invest an accumulated $469.325 billion in China by the end of 1996, a spokesman for the Ministry of Foreign Trade and Economic Cooperation said in a statement made available to Reuters on Tuesday.
Accumulated actual foreign investment was $177.217 billion by the end of last year, ministry spokesman Hu Zhaoqing said.
There were more than 140,000 foreign-funded enterprises in China by end-1996 employing 17 million people, he said.
Their sales and profits had increased gradually each year and exports were rising fast, the spokesman said.
Hu gave no comparative figures or other details.
